label: Limit oral presentation participants to no more than five, including Key Personnel and one prime company representative.
quote: No more than five (5) total Quoter participants shall attend the oral presentation. If the above guidance results in more than 5 participants, at a minimum, the Key Personnel and one prime company representative is required.

label: Provide Contract Specialist with names, employer/company, and email addresses of oral presentation participants at least 48 hours prior.
quote: Quoters shall provide the Contract Specialist with the name, employer/company, and e-mail addresses of the Quoter’s participants for the oral presentation no later than 48 hours prior to the scheduled Oral Presentation.

label: Oral presentations are limited to 45 minutes, exclusive of clarification period.
quote: Oral presentations are limited to 45 minutes in duration, exclusive of any needed Clarification period.

label: Government will not evaluate slide deck information not presented during the 45-minute time limit.
quote: The Government will not evaluate any of the information in the slide deck that is not presented during the Quoter’s 45-minute time limit.

label: Quoter shall not volunteer information that might be construed as changing its quote during oral presentation.
quote: The Quoter shall not volunteer any information that might be construed as changing its quote.
section: Rules of Engagement for Oral Presentations

label: Quoter shall not utilize any computers, tablets, smart phones, or separate conference lines/phones, except those required to host the web-based conference platform, during oral presentation.
quote: The Quoter shall not utilize any computers (other than the ones required to host the web-based conference platform being utilized for the oral presentation), tablets, smart phones, or separate conference lines/phones, while conducting the oral presentation, and shall not bring or distribute any written or electronic materials during the oral presentation.
section: Rules of Engagement for Oral Presentations

label: Quoter participants shall not reach back to any other personnel or persons for assistance during oral presentation.
quote: The Quoter participants shall not reach back, by phone/conference bridge, e-mail or any other means, to any other personnel or persons for assistance during the oral presentation.
section: Rules of Engagement for Oral Presentations
